title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2176/96 of 13 November 1996 amending to scientific and technical progress Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91 (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2176/96 of 13 November 1996 amending to scientific and technical progress Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91 (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
